title: Spawn Receipt
description: Record of a spawned POW instance with lineage tracking

spawned_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the POW was spawned

child_execution_id.description: Execution ID of the spawned POW instance

child_pow_ref.description: Reference to the spawned POW definition (e.g., pow:software_product_development@1.0.0)

spawned_from_execution_id.description: Execution ID of the parent POW that spawned this one

spawned_by_operation_id.description: Operation ID (step_id) that performed the spawn

spawned_by_step_name.description: Human-readable name of the step that spawned

lineage.description: Lineage pointers for tracing spawn chain

name.description: Input name in the spawned POW

artifact_id.description: Source artifact ID from parent POW

seed_inputs.description: List of artifacts passed as seed inputs to the spawned POW

project_id.description: Project ID the spawned POW belongs to

project_event_written.description: Whether a project event was written for this spawn
